obtainAreaStatus

public java.lang.Object[] obtainAreaStatus(Rect area)
Obtains the status of a given area upon the field.

Parameters:
area -
Returns:
An array of Object. The first index is the status code, an Integer object which can be either: * Field.AREA_STATUS_INTERSECTS_WALL_OBJ, * Field.AREA_STATUS_INTERSECTS_FO_OBJ, * Field.AREA_STATUS_INTERSECTS_DOOR_OBJ, * or Field.AREA_STATUS_EMPTY_OBJ
